scripts.ignore: sh -c 'find ./dist -type f -exec sed -i -E "s/function _interopRequire/\/* istanbul ignore next *\/\nfunction _interopRequire/g" {} \;'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run bundle
scripts.test: babel test.js > dist/test.js && npm run ignore && istanbul test ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha dist/test.js --report html -- -R spec && rm dist/test.js
scripts.coverage: babel test.js > dist/test.js && npm run ignore && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha dist/test.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && rm -rf ./coverage && rm dist/test.js
scripts.cov: babel test.js > dist/test.js && npm run ignore && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha dist/test.js -- -R spec && rm dist/test.js
